argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfr.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_epweon | |- _E We On |
| 3 |  | #P_epse | |- _E Se On |
| 4 |  | #P_tfrALTlem | |- recs ( G ) = wrecs ( _E , On , G ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_eqtri | |- F = wrecs ( _E , On , G ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_wfr1 | |- F Fn On |
\
 ~ tfr1 via well-founded recursion.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Apr-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
